    def _wait_for_response(self):

    def access_codex_features(self):

    def send_message_to_chatgpt(self, message: str):
        """ChatGPT'ye mesaj gÃ¶nder"""
        if not self.logged_in:
            print("âŒ ChatGPT'ye login yapÄ±lmamÄ±ÅŸ")
            return None
        
        driver = self.browser_agent.driver
        
        try:
            # Chat input alanÄ±nÄ± bul
            input_selectors = [
                'textarea[placeholder*="Message"]',
                'div[contenteditable="true"]',
                'textarea[data-id*="input"]',
                'textarea[id*="prompt"]',
                '#prompt-textarea'
            ]
            
            input_element = None
            for selector in input_selectors:
                try:
                    elements = driver.find_elements(By.CSS_SELECTOR, selector)
                    for element in elements:
                        if element.is_displayed() and element.is_enabled():
                            input_element = element
                            break
                    if input_element:
                        break
                except:
                    continue
            
            if not input_element:
                print("âŒ ChatGPT input alanÄ± bulunamadÄ±")
                return None
            
            # MesajÄ± stealth mode ile yaz
            print("ğŸ’¬ ChatGPT'ye mesaj gÃ¶nderiliyor...")
            
            input_element.clear()
            if self.browser_agent.is_stealth_mode:
                # Ä°nsan benzeri yazma
                for char in message:
                    input_element.send_keys(char)
                    time.sleep(random.uniform(0.02, 0.08))
                
                # Ä°nsan benzeri hareket
                self.browser_agent._human_like_interactions()
                time.sleep(random.uniform(1.0, 2.0))
            else:
                input_element.send_keys(message)
            
            # Send butonunu bul ve tÄ±kla
            send_selectors = [
                'button[data-testid*="send"]',
                'button[aria-label*="Send"]',
                'button:contains("Send")',
                '[data-testid*="send-button"]'
            ]
            
            sent = False
            for selector in send_selectors:
                try:
                    buttons = driver.find_elements(By.CSS_SELECTOR, selector)
                    for button in buttons:
                        if button.is_displayed() and button.is_enabled():
                            if self.browser_agent.is_stealth_mode:
                                time.sleep(random.uniform(0.5, 1.0))
                                self.browser_agent._human_like_interactions()
                            
                            button.click()
                            sent = True
                            print("âœ… Mesaj gÃ¶nderildi")
                            break
                    if sent:
                        break
                except:
                    continue
            
            if not sent:
                # Enter tuÅŸu ile gÃ¶ndermeyi dene
                try:
                    input_element.send_keys(Keys.RETURN)
                    sent = True
                    print("âœ… Enter ile gÃ¶nderildi")
                except:
                    print("âŒ Mesaj gÃ¶nderilemedi")
                    return None
            
            # YanÄ±t bekleme
            return self._wait_for_response()
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"âŒ Mesaj gÃ¶nderme hatasÄ±: {e}")
            return None
    
    def _wait_for_response(self):
        """ChatGPT yanÄ±tÄ±nÄ± bekle"""
        print("â³ ChatGPT yanÄ±tÄ± bekleniyor...")
        
        driver = self.browser_agent.driver
        wait_time = random.uniform(15.0, 25.0) if self.browser_agent.is_stealth_mode else 20.0
        time.sleep(wait_time)
        
        # YanÄ±t alanlarÄ±nÄ± bul
        response_selectors = [
            '[data-message-author-role="assistant"]',
            '.markdown',
            '.prose',
            '[data-testid*="conversation-turn"]',
            '.message-content'
        ]
        
        response_text = ""
        for selector in response_selectors:
            try:
                messages = driver.find_elements(By.CSS_SELECTOR, selector)
                if messages:
                    # En son mesajÄ± al
                    latest_message = messages[-1]
                    response_text = latest_message.text.strip()
                    if response_text and len(response_text) > 20:
                        print("âœ… ChatGPT yanÄ±tÄ± alÄ±ndÄ±")
                        return response_text
            except:
                continue
        
        # Alternatif yanÄ±t alma
        try:
            body_text = driver.find_element(By.TAG_NAME, "body").text
            lines = body_text.split('\n')
            # Son mesaj blokunu bul
            for i in range(len(lines)-1, -1, -1):
                if len(lines[i]) > 50:
                    response_text = lines[i]
                    break
        except:
            pass
        
        return response_text if response_text else "ChatGPT yanÄ±tÄ± okunamadÄ±, ancak gÃ¶nderildi."

    def _send_stealth_message(self, message: str):
        """Stealth mode ile mesaj gÃ¶nder"""
        
        try:
            # Input alanÄ±nÄ± bul
            input_selectors = [
                'textarea[placeholder*="Message"]',
                'div[contenteditable="true"]',
                'textarea[data-testid*="chat"]',
                '.ProseMirror',
                '#prompt-textarea'
            ]
            
            input_element = None
            for selector in input_selectors:
                try:
                    elements = self.browser.driver.find_elements(By.CSS_SELECTOR, selector)
                    for element in elements:
                        if element.is_displayed() and element.is_enabled():
                            input_element = element

                    if input_element:
                        break
                except:
                    continue
            
            if not input_element:

            print("ğŸ’¬ Matrix AI proje isteÄŸi gÃ¶nderiliyor...")
            
            # Stealth typing

            if self.browser.is_stealth_mode:

                # Ä°nsan benzeri hareket
                self.browser._human_like_interactions()
                time.sleep(random.uniform(1.0, 2.0))
            else:
                input_element.send_keys(message)
            
            # Send button
            send_selectors = [
                'button[data-testid*="send"]',
                'button[aria-label*="Send"]',
                'button:contains("Send")',
                '[data-testid*="send-button"]'
            ]
            
            sent = False
            for selector in send_selectors:

                    buttons = self.browser.driver.find_elements(By.CSS_SELECTOR, selector)
                    for button in buttons:
                        if button.is_displayed() and button.is_enabled():
                            if self.browser.is_stealth_mode:
                                time.sleep(random.uniform(0.5, 1.0))
                                self.browser._human_like_interactions()
                            
                            button.click()
                            sent = True
                            print("âœ… Mesaj gÃ¶nderildi")
                            break
                    if sent:
                        break
                except:
                    continue
            
            if not sent:
                # Enter ile gÃ¶nder
                try:
                    from selenium.webdriver.common.keys import Keys
                    input_element.send_keys(Keys.RETURN)
                    sent = True
                    print("âœ… Enter ile gÃ¶nderildi")
                except:
                    return "âŒ Mesaj gÃ¶nderilemedi"
            
            # YanÄ±t bekle
            return self._wait_for_matrix_response()
            
        except Exception as e:
            return f"âŒ Mesaj gÃ¶nderme hatasÄ±: {e}"
    
    def _wait_for_matrix_response(self):
        """Matrix AI yanÄ±tÄ±nÄ± bekle"""
        print("â³ ChatGPT yanÄ±tÄ± bekleniyor...")
        
        # Dinamik bekleme sÃ¼resi
        if self.codex_available:
            wait_time = random.uniform(30.0, 60.0)  # Codex daha uzun sÃ¼rebilir
        else:
            wait_time = random.uniform(15.0, 25.0)
        
        time.sleep(wait_time)
        
        # Ä°nsan benzeri hareket
        if self.browser.is_stealth_mode and random.random() < 0.3:
            self.browser._human_like_interactions()
        
        # YanÄ±t selectors
        response_selectors = [
            '[data-message-author-role="assistant"]',
            '.markdown',
            '.prose',
            '[data-testid*="conversation-turn"]',
            '.message-content',
            '[data-testid*="assistant-message"]'
        ]
        
        response_text = ""
        for selector in response_selectors:
            try:
                messages = self.browser.driver.find_elements(By.CSS_SELECTOR, selector)
                if messages:
                    # En son mesajÄ± al
                    latest_message = messages[-1]
                    response_text = latest_message.text.strip()
                    if response_text and len(response_text) > 50:
                        print("âœ… Matrix AI yanÄ±tÄ± alÄ±ndÄ±")
                        return response_text
            except:
                continue
        
        # Alternatif yanÄ±t alma
        try:
            body_text = self.browser.driver.find_element(By.TAG_NAME, "body").text
            lines = body_text.split('\n')
            # En uzun satÄ±rlarÄ± bul (genellikle yanÄ±t)
            long_lines = [line for line in lines if len(line) > 100]
            if long_lines:
                response_text = '\n'.join(long_lines[-3:])  # Son 3 uzun satÄ±r
        except:
            pass
        
        return response_text if response_text else "ChatGPT yanÄ±tÄ± okunamadÄ±, ancak iÅŸlem tamamlandÄ±."

    def _send_stealth_message(self, message: str):
        """Stealth mode ile mesaj gÃ¶nder"""

            if not sent:
                # Enter ile gÃ¶nder

            # YanÄ±t bekle

    def _wait_for_matrix_response(self):
        """Matrix AI yanÄ±tÄ±nÄ± bekle"""

        # Ä°nsan benzeri hareket

        # YanÄ±t selectors
        response_selectors = [

                    latest_message = messages[-1]
                    response_text = latest_message.text.strip()
                    if response_text and len(response_text) > 50:
                        print("âœ… Matrix AI yanÄ±tÄ± alÄ±ndÄ±")

            except:

        # Alternatif yanÄ±t alma
        try:

            lines = body_text.split('\n')
            # En uzun satÄ±rlarÄ± bul (genellikle yanÄ±t)
            long_lines = [line for line in lines if len(line) > 100]
            if long_lines:
                response_text = '\n'.join(long_lines[-3:])  # Son 3 uzun satÄ±r
        except:
            pass
        
        return response_text if response_text else "ChatGPT yanÄ±tÄ± okunamadÄ±, ancak iÅŸlem tamamlandÄ±."
